• 29 school shootings w/ deaths, and
• 37 school shootings w/ injuries only

name: NCES
tweet:
Of the serious disciplinary actions taken by public schools during SY 2017–18:
• 73% were out-of-school suspensions for 5+ days
• 22% were transfers to specialized schools, &
• 5% were removals w/ no services for the remainder of the school year

More:  https://nces.ed.gov/programs/crimeindicators/ind_18.asp … pic.twitter.com/0mKJkpE0kt
